allow: Bash(uniq -c echo "2. Checking ProtectedRoute usage:" grep -r "ProtectedRoute" ./src --exclude-dir=node_modules)

Bash(node -e "const db = require(''./db/database''); console.log(''Database initialized successfully''); const tidps = db.prepare(''SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM tidps'').get(); console.log(''TIDP count:'', tidps.count);")
